pages.title: Hell's Constructs
pages.text: The Nether is itself constructed of a slew of materials you've not encountered before. I think it would be prudent to collect samples of some, mundane though they seem. Some, such as $(item)Soul Sand$(), and $(item)Basalt$() may even have a reaction to $(item)Liquid Mana$().

pages.heading: Sand
pages.description: Consumes 1 bottles of Liquid Mana (1/4 of a bucket)

pages.heading: Gravel
pages.description: Consumes 1 bottles of Liquid Mana (1/4 of a bucket)
